"We need to completely rethink the minivan," CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made. Sergio Marchionne said that could mean new products that can still carry a lot of people but won't look like traditional minivans. the actress believes NBC's spy drama won't suffer the same fate as Moonlighting, the'80s sitcom that famously fell apart when Bruce Willis and Cybil Shepherd 's main characters finally hooked up. It's often the death of the show when you break the tension and the two lead characters get together, Yvonne Strahovski tells TVGuide.com. Eric Schmidt drew fire for responding to a hypothetical question posed at a forum in Washington, DC, about an implant that would let Google Inc. know what its users were thinking. He responded that Google Inc. 's policy is to get right up to the creepy line and not cross it , and an implant would cross the line. He also said that as users voluntarily share information online, it doesn't need users to type in search queries for the company to tailor the results.
